property.name: text
property.value: This example compares uncoded transmission of a binary antipodal signal through a Gaussian noise channel to coded transmission. The total number of errors in each case and error rate are displayed in the icons below. The ViterbiDecoder actor does soft decoding.

property.name: text
property.value: Authors: Ye Zhou and Edward A. Lee
